content:
Has anyone attempted a port of D3 Map views? https://www.drupal.org/project/d3map_views

I could not find anything in the contributed repos, curious if anyone may have started work on this elsewhere; I'd love to contribute if so!

I generally look in https://github.com/backdrop-ops/contrib/issues as a reference point for port requests/efforts.

backdrop-ops/contrib
Apply to join the contributed code developer team. - backdrop-ops/contrib
I was thinking about it, but this issue makes me hesitant. It's going to be part port and part rewrite https://www.drupal.org/project/d3map_views/issues/3017789
